Enjoy."/pause 500/move Willy 0 -2 0/move Lewis -1 0 2/move Lewis 0 1 2/playSound coin/pause 400/move Lewis 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Lewis "Well, that's it for this year's Festival of Ice. Thanks for coming, everyone!#$b#Now let's release these poor fish...$s"/move Lewis -2 0 0/pause 600/viewport move 1 0 5000/pause 2000/playMusic none/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "I didn't win the competition, but it was still fun! Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.Evelyn: Did I ever tell you how {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} and I first met? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} actually pelted me with a snowball in this very festival.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} was a {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Gentleman:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} back then, and came over to see if I was okay.$h
Entries.Clint: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} started helping me without any provocation... does that mean something? *gulp*$4
Entries.Pam: I plan on winning the ice fishing competition!#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} is gonna be pretty hard to beat, though... {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}} does this kinda stuff day and night.$s
Entries.Elliott: I'm entering the ice fishing competition today. Why not?#$e#It's rare that {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} ever loses, though.
